attributes.action: stop funding the non syrian rebels and listen to the syrian people !!
attributes.additional_details: Our government continues to fund the syrian opposition knowing full well that the majority involved are not even syrian but from other neighbouring countries and linked to various terrorist organisations !!  Should they actual speak to the syrian people then they would know that again, the vast majority are behind Bashar Al Assad and want the rebels gone !  ITS TIME IT STOPPED !!
